"(Sittin' On) The Dock of the Bay" is a song co-written by soul singer Otis Redding 
and guitarist Steve Cropper. It was recorded by Redding twice in 1967, including 
once just days before his death in a plane crash. The song was released on Stax 
Records' Volt label in 1968, becoming the...

and B-sides dating back to 1965 and one of his best known songs, the
